website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable shelves slide up, down, or to the side to accommodate large bottles.
pros: Highly adjustable with the turn of a dial

customer_reviews.title: Began rusting after a couple months of use
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty expensive for a shower caddy, so I expected better quality. After a few months of use the second row began to rust, which was very surprising to me considering that it was used very lightly relative to the other rows. This is particularly disappointing given that I decided to spend a little extra money to specifically avoid the risk potential rusting. I've had great experiences with a lot of simplehuman products, this was clearly not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Chen

customer_reviews.title: RUSTS!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a year now... well made other than it being made of stainless steal, which it wound up rusting after about six months I would not recommend buying this product, IT RUSTS!
customer_reviews.author: Drk9ght

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the price, false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Product advertises "rust proof" but it really does the opposite. I noticed minor rusting in some areas; I later discovered that the rusting is everywhere. How can they offer "rust proof" and then the product rusts so fast? High price but low quality, Their reputation is at floor level. And their customer service sucks, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hanging shower caddy on the market
customer_reviews.text: Can't say more about this, fits perfect in my shower and holds large bottles which most shower caddys dont. It's worth the splurge
customer_reviews.author: City girl Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Works well for handheld/removable showerheads
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with these. I have one in each shower and they’re great for my particular issues that made normal shower caddies problematic. I have a removable shower head AND build in soap dishes that are too close to where normal caddies hang. This works for both of those issues and it is really sturdy and fantastic. In one shower we have textured tile and the enclosed adhesive tabs work well for that shower. In the other shower those aren’t needed: the suction works well too! I’m so happy to have these now... I’ve been going crazy with the variety of cheap solutions I’ve tried to employ. Spend the money: soooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Acacia

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a modern bathroom shower.
customer_reviews.text: The 'adjustable' is misleading. This caddy will fit only a specific shower head connection diameter that is not mentioned in the description. I have 3 shower heads of varying size and this caddy will not fit any of them. Ask for the diameter specs before ordering, the manufacturer omits this vital information.
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: The best shower caddy ever made!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review for anything i've bought before, but THIS deserves a million stars. I am not kidding you..my boyfriend and I nearly became alcoholics over trying to find a solution shower caddy that wouldn't take up too much space or fall off the wall from crappy suction cups that supposedly would hold a 30lb kettlebell weight. Whoever designed this deserves an award because they thought of everything. The shelves are adjustable and there is room for every bottle no matter what size. I am buying another one for my downstairs bath I love it that much. Worth every single penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Lewallen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. This unit is huge and holds all our products. The top and middle racks are adjustable up and down. For such a large unit, it is surprisingly streamlined and doesn't stick out into your shower space. Suction cups/adhesive stickers did not stick to our tumbled tile, and this was not a problem. The unit has the best shower neck fastener I have seen. It's very secure. The stainless is high quality and I do not expect this unit to rust like the cheap units do.
customer_reviews.author: Crackofnoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like simplehuman products. They are well made and come with a very good warranty.The installation of the item is simple and straightforward. There is a screw at the top of the caddy where the loop is, unscrew and mount it on the shower head. The caddy also comes with two clear stick-on plastic circles, which for me was excellent! Reason being, the suctions cups on the caddy were spaced in a way that they fell on the connection between tiles. I just placed the clear stick-on plastic circles on the tile and placed the suction on top, and the caddy does not move.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: and this is the perfect caddy. Solidly constructed and easy to move the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased one of these (though my previous one was an older model that was slightly different). I have a ton of products in my shower, all ranging in sizes, and this is the perfect caddy. Solidly constructed and easy to move the shelves around. I have a handheld shower head and I just tuck the portion that connects to the pipe behind the basket--it doesn't impact how the caddy hangs, nor does it prevent range of motion with the shower head. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: txshoelover

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Still have previous one that I had for years and it still perfect, needed one over the door, shower head has hose now.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect caddy. I also have the over the shower-head version, which I have had for many years. That one is still perfect (no rust, peeling or anything, looks just like new), but it doesn't play well with my new shower head that has a hose. So, I switched to one that goes over the door (I put it over one of the walls of my glass shower, not the door). It's the same design as my other one and holds everything I need perfectly. I have several liter bottles of shampoo/conditioner, soaps, other shampoos/conditioner, razor, a squeegee, and my bath puff on this. Keeps everything organized and off the floor :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 5 months of use
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months the shower caddy is rusting. Very disappointed!! The protective coating is disintegrating with just normal use (no harsh chemicals or scrubbing have been used).
customer_reviews.author: Veronicalovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Caddy
customer_reviews.text: This shower caddy is the best I have ever seen. The materials used are excellent, no rust. The adjustability of shelves comes in quite handy for various sizes of bottles. There is a designed hole is some shelves for putting that one bottle with low contents upside-down. Plenty of hangers and a soap dish. I had to use the provided double stick tape to adhere the lower suction cup to the shower wall. Suction cups always have difficulty sticking to surfaces that are not smooth. I should also mention this caddy hold a lot of stuff. My wife could not be happier. As they say happy wife, happy life. That alone made this purchase worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: CAF

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with his shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with his shower caddy. After my last shower caddy's suction cups failed and it fell off the wall, and damaged the tub. I decided to go with one that would go over the shower head extension. I've never been fond of this type of over the pipe caddy, because they felt loose and flimsy. Simple human has a great answer for that problem, and this thing is solid as a rock. I've loaded it up with lots of stuff, and it is working extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Que

customer_reviews.title: Rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: One month in and the top basket/shelf is already rusting. So disappointed because it would otherwise be a nice shower caddy! Doesn’t bode well for long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: JakeReviews

customer_reviews.title: SimpleHuman is Best Caddy for Showerheads w Hose Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: The design of this Simplehuman adjustable shower Caddy XL is a perfect fit for my Moen Magnetix Showerhead with Hose Sprayer. The construction is solid and neck holds tightly around shower pipe. I believe this product will not rust because it appears to be stainless steel with plastic knobs. My bathroom has thick tile that cannot work with suction cups but it's a non-issue as it holds sturdy against tile wall without suction. The adjustable features allow you to shorten or lengthen the main center piece to fit exactly between shower pipe and hot/cold lever. This is really a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: It rusts.
customer_reviews.text: I would say that I love this shower caddy, but this claim: “Rust-proof materials Constructed from stainless steel and anodized aluminum” is not so accurate. Sadly, it has rusted!
customer_reviews.author: pdillagrace

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this item. I am a fan of simplehuman products, but this one falls very short. You cannot use this item if you have a hand held shower head. The handle and hose of the shower has NO place to go and you cannot move the trays over far enough to get out of the way. If you move the trays down, you would have to move both of them down to hit the soap dish. Not well thought out for the modern bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give anything a five star review. If I could give this product a six star review, I would!! It exceeded my expectations. It is sturdy, looks good and holds ALL of my shower stuff (and I have a lot). I love that it gives you the option to store bottles upside down and there are plenty of compartments to hold stuff. Additionally, the soap holder part has a plastic insert that is removable and can be cleaned. No more rusty shower caddy!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Susco

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: This caddy replaced another SimpleHuman caddy. I’d had not one problem with the previous one. I’d been looking for another with adjustable shelves. This fits the bill. Just installed it. Don’t know if you can tell, but I’m a shorty. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Niecy11419

customer_reviews.title: Some installation notes
customer_reviews.text: This is a handsome, and of course useful, addition to our bathroom. Seems well made but it's about an inch shorter than what's listed in the description, certainly not a deal breaker. Installation notes: (1) Shelf Adjustments should be made before installing because the rear knobs are a bit difficult to access once it's against the wall (2) The caddy comes with a couple of disc shaped adhesive pads for the suction cups in order to secure the bottom to wall. Don't bother, they don't work well. Instead I used a tiny piece of waterproof double sided tape on the suction cups and it holds to the wall much better
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, lousy suction cups
customer_reviews.text: Great features, but the suction cups that hold it on place arrived warped by heat and are useless causing the rack to shift every time that I try to get anything to or from it and it sits cock-eyed on the shower wall unless I balance the stuff on it. Ruins the whole thing. It does come with patches to glue the suction cups to the shower (I guess they know that they are poor quality), but then I can't clean behind it -- not an option.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews--it rusts.
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as being made of "rust-proof materials." However, I am on my second one in a little over a year--both have rusted. Please exclude the claim of rust-proof materials from the product listing--it has proven twice to be incorrect. It has a fine design otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is very versatile. Most walk in showers have a soap dish that interferes with caddies. But with this one the baskets move up and down or left to right allowing it to fit around soap dishes. Seems well made and the suction cups hold well on my smooth tile. One could possibly have a problem depending on grout lines, but there are workarounds. The hook that goes on the shower head pipe hold securely, but won't fit an over sized pipe. Have read reviews that mention rust, but only time will tell. In an email from the company they verify it's 18/10 stainless steel. If it does rust, it's got a 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Crhoff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on all the good reviews, and have one to contribute myself! I love this product! I have had it for several months now and it is heavy duty, easy to use, and doesn't rust. I was skeptical about the suction cups, but I have had no issue with it moving. It's honestly the first shower caddie I've ever had that wasn't a rusted mess and/or falling down every time I got in the shower. It's been great for an apartment shower/tub with no storage space!
customer_reviews.author: aimeed22

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out shower shelf with nice materials.
customer_reviews.text: The construction is solid, the materials seem to be rust free, and the design is nice and modern. The adjustable height shelves are a great idea, and executed in a sturdy way. The removable soap dish makes cleaning it easy, and adjustable dividers help prop up odd-shaped containers. There are hangers for two rasors, and at the bottom, there is a small hook for hanging a shower puff. We have a center valve below the shower head, and it's about 1/2" too close to the head, so only one suction cup can be used at the bottom, and the puff hanger hook is unusable. If you have two valves, it should be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.text: These folks know design. We have one of their trash cans and love it! This is worth the extra $$. Two things that make it great: 1) the rubber gasket that holds the top in place; 2) the little adhesive disks they supply. These two things make it sturdy. I’ve had other cheaper solutions that work, but swing freely - this is sturdy and stays in place. Great little shower caddy even though it’s a little pricey. *Update: only issue in the design is that the soap dish drips onto the tub spout and handle below leaving soap residue. Other than that it’s been solid for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: D.S. - Lancaster PA

customer_reviews.title: I hate my bathroom until this thing
customer_reviews.text: It is money that is well spent. I have wayyy too many products and they crowded my bathtub. The old rack I had started rusting and stained the tiles we had. When the bathroom got remodeled I made it a necessity to get something that won't rust. YES IT IS EXPENSIVE. But you will keep it until your kids have kids. And I'm barely 22. So invest in it, you won't regret this adult decision to better your life and declutter your restroom. I haven't used the upside down bottle feature because I don't have products that open that way but it probably works just as well as the rest of the unit. Easy to install, looks classy af
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a really old ghetto building where absolutely nothing is maintained well, including the bathroom. Naturally, I was really worried about hanging anything off of the showerhead but lo and behold these haven't broken off my century-old showerhead. I buy like the massive 32oz bottle of shampoo, conditioner, and body wash (I probably shouldn't) but this caddy has been able to hold them all. I've had it for more than 6 months now and it's still going strong. Literally worth the price already because before I had this caddy, I had absolutely ZERO storage space in my shower. I'd gladly buy another if this one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: The best looking and versatile caddie for detachable shower heads
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, holds everything, detachable shower head hose not in the way, holds large bottles in all four compartments (8 bottles total! ) plus places for multiple razors,loofahs, bar soap,wash cloths. The clamp for the shower head nipple is super smart makes it easy to install and really secure, no fear of unit falling. The suction cups worked for a while and made using the pumps on soap bottles easy. But over time they lost their ability to really grip. However unit is still very useful, just have to be a bit more mindful when using pumps. I know it's on the more expensive end of the spectrum of shower caddies but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David Barlass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Nothing to it to install. On ly one screw to tighten on top and your done. Suction cups automatically stuck to my bathroom wall and moving the racks up or down is so easy as turning a knob and following the stamped arrow on the knob. Simple as that. Glides up or down to whatever height you want and then you tighten by turning the knob in opposite direction. Do this before hanging it over showerhead. Everything fits and I still have room for more. I love it. - 6 months later - Still no rust and still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Holds an amazing about of stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome shower caddy I have ever seen. It's amazing. Everything is adjustable. And you can see from picture -- good gracious -- it holds A LOT. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: BLucas

customer_reviews.title: bought 2, 1 missing soap dish
customer_reviews.text: caddy is great, very modern looking - functional noticed our of 2 ordered, 1 came packaged well, the other missing soap dish with no protection contacted Amazon all they could do is have me send back the whole unit ans wait for return, too much of a hassle as I no longer have the huge box to send back ill just have to keep one without it, but for the price of the caddy it should come complete not missing parts overall beautiful and works great, just hope it comes complete
customer_reviews.author: Lfee

customer_reviews.title: some rusting after about a year
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when they were on sale. The design is perfect. The only gripe I have is that these were not supposed to rust but after about a year there was some rust. I noticed that there is this thin plastic like layer on top of the chromed parts and that was starting to break down, wrinkling and flaking off. Either because the layer came off allowing moisture to contact the metal or the moisture is getting trapped between the plastic and the metal is causing the rust is my guess.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Does rust
customer_reviews.text: Does rust. I have purchased a few times because it's still a good storage unit but I need to replace every few years but buyer beware, it does rust.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Almost 100%A+
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and adaptable except for one thing - the top hanger bracket does not fit well if the shower wall is not smooth on the outer side, as the upper outer bracket arm will get caught in any horizontal seam in the wall. In our case, the horizontal seam between the upper shower extrusion and the outer shower glass wall. This prevents the upper bracket from firmly holding the vertical stem of the Caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Sturdy Organizer
customer_reviews.text: My son, 13yrs, love the tiers to place all of his shower items. Plenty of room to place items and organize. It is secure and doesn't fall down, he likes the clamp at the top. The design of our fiberglass shower wall prevents the suction cups to stay attached. When we upgrade and replace this with tile that will change the problem. It's easier for him to take items off without everything falling down compared to the other one he had. He likes the soap holder, a great organizing station for him.
customer_reviews.author: The Best

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This shower rack is amazing! I was hesitant to purchase it because of the price but I am so glad I did! The tile used in the shower in my home is not suction friendly and I had purchased a different shower rack/caddy that did not work. It kept sliding off of the showerhead and the suction just would not work. I bought this hoping that it would work and it definitely did. The design is very nice, clean and well made. It has not moved an inch since we put it up! I love that the shelves are adjustable and can be put at different heights. This shower caddy is worth the price! A must buy
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Really a outstanding product.  The best I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I like the positive method of attaching to shower head pipe which prevents slipping down pipe. This product may not be perfect, however is far superior to other products on the market. I'm amending my review after several months to add that the shower caddy is outstanding. There is no rust as several have indicated and the the caddy still looks and operated like new. It stays in place and is exceptionally functional. If the suction cups did come loose, I would apply a dab of RTV to keep them in place.
customer_reviews.author: waneill

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: Had one previously for a few years and it was great, although it rusted after three or so years, no problem. Went to replace it and received one with a broken shelf wire, and knobs that would not turn or just barely with channel-locks, and the shelves would absolutely not slide up or down at all. Sent it back and bought another, which I should receive soon. These look good and work well. The new design is updated and looks better but they may be falling down on quality. Because they have a good design, they have one more chance.
customer_reviews.author: jackstraw

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to spend what seemed a ridiculous amount for a shower organizer!! But I was pleasantly surprised at how worth it it was. The shower hose was always getting atuck on my old caddy and this has eliminated that problen!!
customer_reviews.author: Life Learner

customer_reviews.title: Good [large] Caddy
customer_reviews.text: This thing hangs on the shower head pipe and clamps in. Then a suction towards the bottom keeps any residual swing in check. Adjustable shelves which are solid. So, Solid/Secure/High Quality...but Big
customer_reviews.author: AGoodfriend

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I always use Simplehuman shower caddy’s however as I was setting up my shower caddy I noticed that on the back packaging was a gray toothbrush holder so I went to see images others have uploaded in there review and saw they’re shower caddy’s came with this compartment. So I go to report a missing piece and now either I have to call the manufacture or send the product back to return. Compare my first photo to others and you will see it is missing. I also included a photo of the back packaging showing the toothbrush holder. If I’m paying this price there should be no parts missing. What a fuss!!!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about spending this much money on a shower organizer, but I like it so much! It is exactly what I wanted. My husband suggested putting it in the back of the shower & it works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Holly P.

customer_reviews.title: An Exceptional Pro. duct
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this product because I am quite frugal, but I am so glad I did! It has exceeded my expectations and is worth every penny. The versatility of each of the storage units and the ability to adjust everything has made it fit our needs perfectly. My favorite part is I don't have to worry about the dreaded fall forward like every other shower caddy I have had did. This storage unit stays in place without hesitation. It has been in the shower for a couple of weeks now and no signs of rust at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Too long to fit a modern shower - make sure to measure first.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and I love SimpleHuman products. Sad to have to send it back. It's too long to fit my shower - the suction cups sit halfway down the plate around the water faucet. Would be great if SimpleHuman would make a shorter one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to replace my old rusty shower caddy with this stainless steel one that I expect will never rust. I looked at A LOT of caddies and A LOT of reviews on Amazon; this had the best combination of features (for me). Before I ordered, I'd assumed I'd be able to move the plastic hooks from the right side to the left side. However on arrival a close inspection reveled that the hooks can't be moved w/o damage. I was slightly disappointed but it isn't too big of an issue. (The suction cups could be better, but that was not too important to me either.)
customer_reviews.author: Judge Mental

customer_reviews.title: Super attractive product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - it turned a humble guest bathroom into an upscale-looking, built-in-like shower spa. The caddy is made of sturdy premium materials, it has countless ways to hold a gazillion things, and the built-in-shower console look transforms the space visually. Initially, I balked at the cost, but I am so happy with the purchase that I considered buying a second one for my own bathroom. Totally worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: BG in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Just suck it up and get it. It works and holds a ton of stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Why did I waste so much money in the past on junk that never held everything and would eventually crash to the floor in the middle of the night??? Wish I could go back and just get this one. The only thing I do NOT like is the price, and I definitely still wish it wasn’t so expensive. However, with that said it is the only thing on the market that actually does the job well. I’m am so glad that everything is out of the way from my toddlers’ reach and that it can actually hold stuff that I’ve been having to store under my sink and take out as needed.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Love it. But starts swinging after a month!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product - if only they would provide better adhesives or rubber suctions! It worked for a month or so but now swings wildly in my shower. I followed the instructions and applied the "rough surfaces" sticker first to the bathroom tiles, but that just came off. What a pity as this unit would be amazing if they fixed this!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cork

customer_reviews.title: Second Times The Charm
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered came in broken. Customer service was prompt with getting a replacement sent out. The second one came in perfect condition. I put this in my daughters bathroom and it holds all her shower items with no problem. I love that it screws around the shower head as well as suctions at the bottom so it's not moving anywhere. SimpleHuman products are amazing and I recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Bratlie

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shower Caddy
customer_reviews.text: Glad I stuck with this size instead of the bigger one or it would have been too long and would be hanging over my shower knob. The downside to this is the storage capacity. This was super easy to install and pretty sturdy. I’m not sure how long it’ll stay looking good or rust-free but I’m pretty happy with it so far. This only my second Simple Human product purchase ever. I do have have their step stainless trash can and it does seem like they make quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Lmlwilliams

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: no need for me to post a photo, because it looks EXACTLY as it is shown in product description from seller it works great exactly as expected after using it for about a month it is working just as new it really feels like it was part of the bathroom design read the product descriptions of how to install a follow the strict guideline of the instructions for installation this product will last a very long time it is probably the most pricey of all shower caddies. for what it's worth perhaps it is also the best product out there
customer_reviews.author: TaiOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman Adjustable Shower Caddy XL
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made and an easy install. The aluminum and stainless steel has held up well so far with no evidence of corrosion or rust. Minimal issues with suction cups may be due to my shower tile surfaces and not the product. It has far surpassed the rusty "stainless steel" shower caddy that it replaced in my shower. I have been very pleased with all of the Simplehuman products I have purchased to date.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I hesitated
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the door-sized hook on this caddy wouldn't work well over the glass wall of my shower. I was wrong. This thing is very sturdy, and the hook that goes over the shower wall can be adjusted to hug a thin wall like glass very securely. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kept trying different shower caddies & none were staying up in our new shower, but this one is PERFECT!!! I was apprehensive about the cost at first but it is well worth the money! Perfectly stable & adjustable so now we don’t have to worry about hearing a crashing sound of our products falling off the shower wall! Cleans super easy as well! I don’t regret this purchase one bit! Donating all the failed ones to goodwill as this will be the only one we will ever need!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't accommodate large shampoo and conditioner bottles
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't accommodate large shampoo and conditioner bottles. I can place one on it but not both because they don't adjust enough and the top shelf is too high for my daughter to use. If I lower them all down it makes the bottom two shelves almost completely useless. Frustrated with having to find alternate bottles to refill with the large bottles. Love the look though, very clean and nice looking which is the only reason I didn't give it a two.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: May not fit all showerheads
customer_reviews.text: This shower caddy will probably work well for most people, but I wanted to write a review because my experience was less than ideal. Basically, the clamp at the top did not fit my shower head so I had to remove the rubber parts and hang it from the curtain rod instead. It works but is a little janky and I would have preferred to hang it on the shower head itself. One other minor annoyance is that the hooks aren’t supposed to be able to be moved, so they only fit cleanly on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shower caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flexibility of this shower caddy. There are so many adjustments up and down and side to side that can be made. Love that they contained the soap bar in a plastic container separate from the metal base. I have used a very similar product from this company prior to purchasing this one. I believe this one will last much longer because of the separated section for the bar of soap. It is my favorite shower caddy of all.
customer_reviews.author: Leegayle

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy for our weird shower.
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a funky home recently that had a shower head that was off to the side with a metal bar... this made a everyday shower caddy impossible to use in the tub. This one is awesome because you can move the shelves all to one size and make it fit. The way it’s designed it doesn’t tilt due to the weight being on one side (at least for us). I really like this caddy!
customer_reviews.author: MountainMama

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is more than I'd ever imagine spending on a shower organizer, but it's so much better quality than cheaper ones. I like that it doesn't move when I put a heavy shampoo or conditioner bottle on it. There's really no point in having one if every time I try to put something on it, it tips over and the bottles end up on the shower floor. I also like that there is a spot for razors. The best part is that it is adjustable! We've only had it a month so it's early to test the rust free feature. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Phillygal84

customer_reviews.title: The Last Shower Caddy I'll Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressively well constructed shower caddy. It is made of aluminum and will not rust (like the caddy it replaced). Additionally, it is adjustable in several ways: the shelving moves up and down and the entire spine of the unit moves up and down. It also has storage for things like toothbrushes, wash cloths, and razors. It seems worth the added cost.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Campion

customer_reviews.title: Simple and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I decided to remodel my shower stall and looked long and hard for shower caddy that was not only simple but functional as well,...this particular caddy fit all my expectations,... it’s adjustable , clean and is a beautiful looking little unit. There was a ton of cheaper caddys out there but I’m quite happy I spent the few extra dollars for this unit
customer_reviews.author: G'MAN

customer_reviews.title: Great addition; Sturdy and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping around a while for a shower caddy that would work with my very high showerhead. I found this one and despite the fact that I had to invest some real cash into this piece ... it is well worth the money and is an excellent addition to my shower. The expandable neck works perfectly and it is super sturdy!! I recommend this for anyone who like me has a shower in need of some storage
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shower Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this caddy for several weeks now and I love it. My husband and I use different products so we have quite a few in the shower. It holds all the bottles we use. We had a smaller one and we had bottles sitting all along the shower ledge. Shower looks so neat and orderly. No problems with the seller. Product arrived when expected and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, but takes up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: It works and looks great! Be weary though, if your shower head is pretty close too the wall, you will find yourself bumping into this thing more often than not. Wouldn't recommend this if you aren't able to angle your shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit All Shower Heads!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product as I absolutely love the simplehuman brand but this shower caddy did not fit my modern shower head and since I am past the return timeframe, I cannot return it or use it.
customer_reviews.author: chippotle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I had the older caddy, the one that didn't extend and was ready for an upgrade. With the extendable neck, everything is easy to reach, I don't have to reach up. This caddy is also very spacious. There is so much room. I can easily fit 2 Redken for mens shampoo and conditioner (Large 33.8 OZ) on the top right corner alone. Plenty of room for the girlfriends things as well....lol. This is very durable and rust proof. Very happy with this and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Broke first day, and suction defective.
customer_reviews.text: We own a lot of Simple Human gear at our house, and have always liked their products. Though we like the design here, the suction cups simply don’t work. Further, the plastic on the top is already cracked from when I tightened the set screw on the shower head pipe. I’m not confident this thing will stay in place, or last very long. Terrible build quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk J.

customer_reviews.title: the best thing that has ever happened to me
customer_reviews.text: My shower has a bizarrely placed built in soap dish that blocked any other shower caddy from hanging properly; they had to list at an 8 o'clock or 5 o'clock angle. Not only did it look dumb, but it was all but useless for actually using a caddy. Now that I have this magnificent stallion, I have a perfectly perpendicular shower caddy, and all my bathing accouterments can be stored upon it! My shower no longer appears drunk and cluttered, but rather an isle of serenity. My life has improved in at least four different areas from this caddy alone. It is truly The Best Thing That Ever Happened to Me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall showers
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure, but I think this house was built for NBA stars. Anyway, everything is really tall, including the shower enclosure. I tried my old over-the-enclosure caddy, and I couldn't reach anything. So I bought this one. It adjusts really well, holds, everything I need, adheres nicely to the glass so it isn't banging around. I was happy to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, good quality, love the extension movement easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Just got it out it right up, on the shower, lightweight, easy to adjust, direction in the insert. very spacious soap and container holders, nothing to close together. I can reach the whole thing even the top. it is all adjustable I'm 5ft tall. it says it will not rust. I appreciate this shower mechanism. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and holds everything
customer_reviews.text: Very study and holds everything we need; even rather large shampoo bottles. We've had them for a few months now and they still look great. Husband likes the razor hook on the side to hang is razor up. The only downside is the hanging mechanism doesn't have hooks to hang towels on so we had to buy some suction cup hooks but those worked great so its all good.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you have a handheld shower attachment, this is the BEST. It holds a ton of products, is super sturdy and is just overall very, very well-made. I know it's quite a bit more expensive than the other options out there, but after trying it out, I'm so glad I chose this one over anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This is not a paid review. I purchased this to use in my shower because I have a Moen handheld slide bar shower head in addition to my regular shower head and needed a shower rack that was adjustable so it would clear the slide bar components. This fit the bill perfectly. I can adjust the racks up and down, and side to side so I can fit the shelves in around the slide bar hardware. Its been up a few months and so far no issues with the finish, and all the shelves are holding tight. We don't load it with heavy bottles, just small to medium size stuff.
customer_reviews.author: OBD Newhart

customer_reviews.title: Other than that - perfect. Maybe they'll learn to clean properly in time
customer_reviews.text: Got this for three female tenants sharing one bath - almost everything they had lining the bathtub and collecting mold (not the *best* housekeepers, bless their wee cotton socks) fit into it. There was a LOT of stuff... The only dislikes are that the shelves aren't completely movable (ie, can't move the soap dish to the top), and the suction cups don't work to stabilize it when it's fully loaded - just not enough grip. Other than that - perfect. Maybe they'll learn to clean properly in time, but this will keep the mold and biofilm from swallowing them whole until then.
customer_reviews.author: dropjohn

customer_reviews.title: Singing again
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my shower. It is very strong plenty of storage room for bottles. I highly recommend it for anyone that needs a little extra storage space in their shower. It is very well built easy to install and does not take up very much room. Great place for your microphone while singing in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Pap Here

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shower caddy.  It actually stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many shower caddy's from retails, usually once that simply hangs with grip. NONE of them works. This one works very well since I am able to tighten it with screw around the pipe side and it is quite stable. Adjustable shelf is quite helpful. Could use more shelf which they do have it more much higher cost, so, this will do. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: You will wonder how you lived without this shower caddy. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a steep amount of money for a shower caddy, but totally worth it!! Go ahead and get the giant one, you won't regret it. Fits even in a small shower. All of your shower stuff will be so organized and clean. No cold puddles of water waiting in the lids of your favorite products. No soap scum on anything. Everything with in reach and not falling over. Keep your razor and accessories in the shower but out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell the TRUE quality of the material and durability, but this shelf is GREAT for adjusting to whatever items you need to organize in the shower. The attachment is easy and fast, adjusting the shelves is super easy and they don't seem to loosen over time or with more adjustments. This is the most stable over-the-shower-head caddy I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wrestled with spending so much on a shower caddy when ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrestled with spending so much on a shower caddy when $10-$15 alternatives from TJ Maxx, Walmart, etc are readily available 5 minutes away. That said, I'm shocked at the engineering and quality. This unit is work every penny. One item that was not mentioned in the reviews is that the pipe hole is lined in rubber which mitigates the chance of the unit sliding down the shower head. The adjustable shelves accommodate my wife's large bottles. Now if I can just get her to put them on the shelf vs. the edge of the tub. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: 10n10

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I got this. I almost didn’t buy it because of the price but I read a lot of reviews and went for it. I hate the corner rod shower caddies, I hate the suction caddies and I usually hate the baskets that hang from the shower head but this seems (so far) to be very sturdy. I am so so happy to get all the products off the sides of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Second one I've bought
customer_reviews.text: I'm not normally one for brand loyalty.....but I must admit, Simple Human is becoming a bit of a go-to for everyday household improvements for me. This is the second shower caddy I've bought - just really well thought out, as is their dishrack, kitchen towel holder, trashcans etc. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny Spent
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE SimpleHuman products but this takes the cake! It was worth every penny I spent on it! It fits large bottles and so much more. It suctions on the bottom and well as you screw it together on the shower head so it's not moving anywhere. I recommend this to anyone needing to clean up their shower for an organized look.
customer_reviews.author: Bratlie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My best friend convinced me that this shower caddy was worth the extra money. She was write. Features I love: -very sturdy -attachment to wall is the best of any shower caddy I've had by a long shot -adjustable shelves are easy and make it possible to store all kinds of bottles -love the razor hook! (having two means one for me and one for my partner) -I am old fashioned and like bar soap; the soap holder is easy to remove for cleaning and slotted so the soap doesn't get soggy
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but ok
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product. Just a few small things that I wish....1) Once attached to the showered, it is really high, even after adjustments. I had to move the lower rung as close to the soap dish as possible, and I'm average height, about 5'3". Of course I can reach it, but just not ideal. 2) the suction cups don't work. I don't have much on it now but as soon as I do, it will need more balancing than I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I read numerous reviews on a lot of different shower caddies before deciding on this one. It's a little higher priced but well made and I don't think anyone in the reviews has had trouble with rust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Its OK but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The design is nice and helps to separate your shower accessories. Two of the wire baskets are slightly bent not allowing them to sit flat. This appears to be a production problem not mis-handling during shipping. For the price it should be of better over all quality. My wife likes it so that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Radman

customer_reviews.title: Great design but rusty in a year
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but within a year, it’s all rusty. It’s great looking and perfectly holds a bar soap, multiple shampoo and conditioner bottles, 2 razors and more. But it’s a lot of money for something that will be full of rust in a year!
customer_reviews.author: Prog Drummer

customer_reviews.title: The suction cups don't stick!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but the fact that the suction cups won't stick to anything, including the provided rough surface discs, makes the unit completely unusable. Too bad!
customer_reviews.author: casimir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and I love that the over the shower hook locks in place, my shower tile isn’t very smooth so the suction cups don’t hold on very well, however, it doesn’t impede it from staying on the wall. Great product will definitely be getting another one for our guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: A.Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It's well defined and looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: First impressions - it's well defined and looks sharp. It modernized my tile bathroom instantly. I got the shelves slid left to right, or up and down quickly and easily. It was easy to organize my stuff, and it still looks great. This is the first caddy I've really liked (I've had a few). If design, quality, and sharp looks matter to you then you might appreciate this caddy.
customer_reviews.author: JimG

customer_reviews.title: Soap dish placement
customer_reviews.text: The shower caddy is good quality. My only complaint is that the soap dish needs to be up away from water splashing on the soap. That washes away the soap and deposits it on the wall and shower floor, where it must be cleaned. I moved the soap dish to the top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Skow

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, stays put. This shower caddy has more space than almost every other option I have ever seen. I don't have that many shower accesories, but the extra space comes in handy for visitors. It is very sturdy and stays put, I would reccommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: mrwhite

customer_reviews.title: Worth the high price tag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this in my shower for about 4 months now and without a doubt, it’s the nicest shower organizer I have ever owned. It went up easily and hasn’t moved one bit. Love the adjustable shelves. Once you get them where you want them, you can forget all about them. No sign of rust whatsoever so far. Thought it was a little pricey, but definitely worth the high price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Works great for shower with hand-held head.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Moen magnetic hand-held head (excellent, also) and this caddy creates no problems with the hose. Lots more room for shampoos, washcloths, etc. then we need but better too much room than too little. Adjustable shelves work as advertised and the clamp mechanism for holding the caddy to the head pipe is rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Johnf

customer_reviews.title: looks very nice Con: significantly heavier than my old one TBD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace a cheaper 1-yr old one that was all rusted. Pros: practical; top holders are adjustable and it has a soap bar holder; attaches very firmly to the water pipe; looks very nice Con: significantly heavier than my old one TBD: how quickly it rusts...
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous Product, Virtually Useless
customer_reviews.text: Has ZERO suction power which makes the entire apparatus useless. The sellers of this product should be ashamed of themselves as it is nothing short of a rip off of good folks spending money that is hard to get. Do not get conned by these grifters. Awful product.
customer_reviews.author: Svadhyaya

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, very efficient item
customer_reviews.text: Such a great item, efficient, sturdy, very well made; the concept of it just fits my need so well, i am in awe! I have everything organized in the bathtub and that make me happy. Very easy to fix and it stays put. I also love the brand with all the cool ides they have, *thumbs up* from me The fact that i mounted a flexible shower head looks a bit weird overall with the SIMPLEHUMAN caddy but it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNIT IN FUNCTION AND LOOKS!
customer_reviews.text: THE UNIT IS AWESOME! IT'S HUGE BUT AWESOME1 WE ARE BLESSED TO HAVE A BIG BATHROOM AND SHOWER SO THE SCALE IS OK. THE UNIT FEELS REALLY SOLID OUTTA THE BOX AND IN USE WITH FULL LOAD. THE SUCTION CUPS FOR HOLDING THE BOTTOM IN PLACE LET GO EVERY 2 TO 3 WEEKS. SO I'LL USE CLEAR SILICONE TO FIX THAT WHEN I GET TO IT. OVERALL I LIKE IT AND RECOMMEND IT! ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: LonnyG

product_meta.title: simplehuman Adjustable Shower Caddy Plus, Stainless Steel and Anodized Aluminum
product_meta.description:
Style Name:PlusThe simplehuman adjustable shower caddy plus offers more shelf space and even greater adjustability. In addition to movable shelves, the neck can extend up to 12 inches to add clearance for those really tall bottles. It also lets you position the caddy lower for easy access — very child-friendly. Innovative dividers and compartments are designed to hold bulky modern tools like facial cleansing brushes and oversized razors. Constructed from stainless steel and anodized aluminum so it is rust-proof and easy to clean.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
